alert.note: Alert for Colorado Springs Vicinity, Southern El Paso County, Rampart Range Below 7400 Ft; Northern El Paso County, Monument Ridge, Rampart Range Below 7500 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 19 at 9:02PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern El Paso County through 945 PM MDT... At 901 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Schriever Space Force Base, or 19 miles east of Colorado Springs, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Heavy rain with potential Flash Flooding, and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Yoder, Schriever Space Force Base and Ellicott. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Colorado Springs Vicinity, Southern El Paso County, Rampart Range Below 7400 Ft; Northern El Paso County, Monument Ridge, Rampart Range Below 7500 Ft
